channel.title: Project Blitz Stable, Making A Amazing Stable Server
channel.description:
Server Name: Project Blitz Stable
About: I am making a very stable server out of whitescape, mostly everything will be put in handlers and it will be one of the most stablest servers out, it be like sams untouched server but less stable because i hate mysql
Team: Me and im not letting no one else in because my ideas all ways get leached and if you thinkinh why i am posting this, it is because i bet you only a few people on mopar could do it, not like that leacher for stole my idea of a non and members world -.-
Features atm
Player Right Hangler Almost Full Range Pking And Wepon Delays (almost perfect) fixed the weapon glitchers Almost fixed complete Pking
I am going a aload of work on this server
but i can only do bits of work on it because im PkIsle X dev
the creds go hi123 for the source and rest for me, im coding my ass off rofl
